member.name: T:Kernel.Compiler.App.KernelCompiler
member.summary: The main application process.

member.name: F:Kernel.Compiler.App.KernelCompiler.ErrorColour
member.summary: The colour to display errors messages in.

member.name: F:Kernel.Compiler.App.KernelCompiler.MessageColour
member.summary: The colour to display standard messages in.

member.name: F:Kernel.Compiler.App.KernelCompiler.WarningColour
member.summary: The colour to display warning messages in.

member.name: F:Kernel.Compiler.App.KernelCompiler.TheILCompiler
member.summary: The ILCompiler that will be used by this compiler instance.

member.name: F:Kernel.Compiler.App.KernelCompiler.TheSettings
member.summary: The settings that will be used by this compiler instance.
member.remarks: Initially set to new but empty settings instance so that MSBuild can fill in certain settings. If executed not via MSBuild, this field is set to a new Setttings instance created from the string array of arguments passed to the program.

member.name: F:Kernel.Compiler.App.KernelCompiler.Errors
member.summary: The number of errors outputted.

member.name: F:Kernel.Compiler.App.KernelCompiler.Messages
member.summary: The number of messages outputted.

member.name: F:Kernel.Compiler.App.KernelCompiler.Warnings
member.summary: The number of warnings outputted.

member.name: F:Kernel.Compiler.App.KernelCompiler.ExecutingUnderMSBuild
member.summary: Indicates whether the compiler is running as an MSBuild task or not.

member.name: F:Kernel.Compiler.App.KernelCompiler.MSBuild_Log
member.summary: A reference to the MSBuild Log for outputting errors, warnings and messages.

member.name: M:Kernel.Compiler.App.KernelCompiler.Execute
member.summary: The entry point of the compiler if it is executed as an MSBuild task
member.returns: True if compilation successful. Otherwise false.

member.name: M:Kernel.Compiler.App.KernelCompiler.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: The kernel compiler application's main entry point.
member.param: A list of arguments for the compiler. See Settings for required args and format.
member.returns: The result of compilation. 0 = success, otherwise error code.

member.name: M:Kernel.Compiler.App.KernelCompiler.OutputHelp
member.summary: Outputs the help text.

member.name: M:Kernel.Compiler.App.KernelCompiler.InitILCompiler
member.summary: Initialises the ILCompiler.
member.returns: True if initialisation completed successfully. Otherwise false.

member.name: M:Kernel.Compiler.App.KernelCompiler.InitOutputAndHandlers
member.summary: Initialises the output streams and handlers.
member.returns: True if initialisation completed successfully. Otherwise false.

member.name: M:Kernel.Compiler.App.KernelCompiler.InitSettings(System.String[])
member.summary: Initialises the Settings using the supplied arguments.
member.param: The array of arguments to use for intialisation. See Settings for required args and format.
member.returns: True if initialisation completed successfully. Otherwise false.

member.name: M:Kernel.Compiler.App.KernelCompiler.OutputError(System.Exception)
member.summary: Outputs an error message to the console window.

member.name: M:Kernel.Compiler.App.KernelCompiler.OutputMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Outputs a standard message to the console window.

member.name: M:Kernel.Compiler.App.KernelCompiler.OutputWarning(System.Exception)
member.summary: Outputs a warning message to the console window.
member.param: The exception object that represents the warning message to output.

member.name: M:Kernel.Compiler.App.KernelCompiler.MSBuild_OutputError(System.Exception)
member.summary: Outputs an error message via the MSBuild task.

member.summary: Outputs a standard message via the MSBuild task.

member.name: M:Kernel.Compiler.App.KernelCompiler.MSBuild_OutputWarning(System.Exception)
member.summary: Outputs a warning message via the MSBuild task.
member.param: The exception object that represents the warning message to output.

member.summary: Used by MSBuild to set settings before execution.

member.summary: Used by MSBuild to set settings before execution.

member.summary: Used by MSBuild to set settings before execution.

member.summary: Used by MSBuild to set settings before execution.
